newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK to release 98.76 ha of land in April-June -govt.
newsitem.headline: HK to release 98.76 ha of land in April-June -govt.

text.p: Sino-British Land Commission agreed that the land disposal programme for the period from April 1 to June 30 should amount to 98.76 hectares, the Hong Kong government said in a statement on Wednesday.
